text: avar (taṉ viruppattiṟku māṟāka) oru peṇ kuḻantaiyaip peṟṟeṭuttapōtu ‘‘eṉ iṟaivaṉē! Nāṉ oru peṇṇaiyē peṟṟēṉ'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉār. Āyiṉum (avar virumpiya) āṇ, intap peṇṇaip pōṉṟalla eṉpatai allāh(tāṉ) naṉkaṟivāṉ. (Piṟaku imrāṉiṉ maṉaivi) niccayamāka nāṉ ataṟku ‘maryam' eṉap peyariṭṭēṉ. Ataiyum, ataṉ cantatiyaiyum viraṭṭappaṭṭa ṣaittāṉi(ṉ vañcaṉaikaḷi)liruntu nī kāppāṟṟa uṉṉiṭam pirārttikkiṟēṉ!'' (Eṉṟār)
